articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: One lawmaker received "a barrage of threatening calls". Another says his wife received anonymous texts.
articles.title: Threats fly as Jim Jordan's bid to be US House Speaker turns ugly

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Prosecutors drop their inquiry into a woman's allegation the UFC fighter attacked her at a Miami arena.
articles.title: Conor McGregor won't face charges after sexual assault claim

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Joran van der Sloot "brutally murdered" the Alabama teenager who went missing in Aruba, the judge said.
articles.title: Natalee Holloway's suspected killer, Joran van der Sloot, admits to crime, says mother

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: An elite US law firm says statements backed by three Ivy League students do not fit with its values.
articles.title: Three law students who backed Israel letters lose job offers

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Mr Grassley says 20 couples who met in his office have gone on to get married.
articles.title: Chuck Grassley crowned 'matchmaker' after 20 staff marriages

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Israeli and Palestinian officials have blamed each other for the blast in which hundreds may have died.
articles.title: Biden backs Israel's account of deadly Gaza hospital explosion

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The climate campaigner is accused of breaching the Public Order Act at a demonstration in London.
articles.title: Greta Thunberg charged following Fossil Free London protest

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The US is making it tougher for companies like Nvidia, AMD and Intel to sell existing or new chips to China.
articles.title: US-China chip war: Beijing unhappy at latest wave of US restrictions

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The gang is suspected of illegally importing more than 400 animals into Spain from eastern Europe.
articles.title: Spain: More than 400 animals rescued from illegal trading network

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The presenter, who has a condition affecting her womb, tells MPs her problems were repeatedly dismissed.
articles.title: Naga Munchetty told to 'suck it up' over extreme menstrual problems
